description: Built and launched a Python + SQL dashboard to simplify UW's ticketing system for staff, adopted across the IT team to centralize requests and streamline workflows.

Led a comprehensive student-feedback initiative surveying 200+ students to improve program policies. Spearheaded a CS merchandise rebrand, coordinating with vendors and staff, boosting revenue by 30%.

Engineered a pipeline for Apple Vision Pro teleoperation using Python + Docker, achieving 88.6% joint alignment and 30% smoother motion. Conducted 100+ simulated trials with CNN-based pose estimation and presented results at the UW Allen School Research Showcase (300+ attendees).
Developed automated solutions using Python + Google Apps Script to boost lab throughput by 20%. Automated data analysis pipelines to reduce manual processing.
Built and deployed a React website that boosted online orders by 20% and traffic by 10%. Collaborated directly with the CEO to iterate on UX and brand alignment.

Created data visualizations with Pandas to predict Pokémon ratings and airline satisfaction. Applied neural networks, decision trees, and clustering for predictive modeling. Collaborated on data collection and literature review for final project.
